title: Fees Management System Using Php MySQL
description: A custom-built Fees Management System designed for educational institution. This system simplifies the handling of student records, monthly fees, and collection reports through a secure and user-friendly admin panel.
features: Real-time Reports of Collections and Dues
Institute branding (custom logo, name, and contact settings)

techStack.design: Minimal admin dashboard layout with responsive design

title: Fees Management System Using MERN Stack & Electron Js
description: An advanced Fees Management System built as a desktop application using MERN Stack and Electron JS. This application streamlines the management of student records, monthly fees, and collection reports and a seamless user experience.
features: Real-time Reports of Collections and Dues

techStack.design: Minimal admin dashboard layout with responsive design
